title: [Asylum, Padded Cell]
description: Every wall in this room is covered in a plush, thick white padding.  This place seems to rob the senses, with every sound being absorbed by the room.  The room is extremely dark with only a faint presence of light coming from a narrow slit in the steel door.

Every wall in this room is covered in a plush, thick white padding.  This place seems to rob the senses, with every sound being absorbed by the room.  The room is extremely dark with only a faint presence of light coming from a narrow slit in the solid steel door.
